summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 6.5°C) and outside temperature (down 5.8°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 11211 lux) and cloud levels (up 717 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 12966 lux) and cloud levels (up 1665 m) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 717.4m lower than yesterday, 648.7m lower than the past week, 1664.7m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 1059m to 3380m and averaged 1006.9m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: Partial cloudiness with some periods of sun.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; you can expect comfortable, mild temperatures. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. Chance of light rain, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and periods of sunshine are expected. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
